channel.title: meaning on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in meaning on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: A Sleep Deprived Mind
item.description: I woke up early and worked all day. Had very little lunch but instead of eating dinner at eight pm as I normally do, I went to sing with my friends until around eleven thirty in the night.

item.title: Arranged Marriage
item.description: Arranged marriage is an old concept. It existed long before people accepted love (that occurred before marriage) as a valid reason to marry. The process through which this changed is reflected very well in the movie ‘Fiddler on the Roof’.
